item.title: Matterport conversion to 2D & 3D FloorPlans
item.description:
Matterport conversion to 2D & 3D FloorPlans

The first market that our 3d mapping will be approaching is the Engineering community. This video is a primer for how we can create floor plans from data rich scans. In the description of the video (below) you will see a link to the third party provider of this add on software package. Â There is also a sketchup compatible third party provider which I will post about later.
